channel.title: Weird Problem?
channel.description:
Hello guys I am using the Rune-Legacy base and so far I have removed the old SQL from the server. I am having some other problems.
When ever a player with the rights of 3 aka owner dies he will no respawn and it keeps saying that "oh dear you have died" anyone know how to fix this or where to start looking?
also
When ever someone uses the home teleport it freezes all actions so you can't do anything like talk to an npc or teleport.

item.title: Weird Problem?
item.dc:creator: @dannydude8 dannydude8
item.description:
@dannydude8 wrote:

if ((isDead || playerLevel[3] <= 0) && respawnTimer == -6) { getPA().applyDead(); }

Read full topic

item.title: Weird Problem?
item.dc:creator: @schiffel123 schiffel123
item.description:
@schiffel123 wrote:

Take a look at your applydead() method for the first.

Second; go to your home teleport method\actionbutton or wherever it’s located.

Read full topic
